javaWebsites.name: Udemy
javaWebsites.description: Udemy is one of the best online resources for developers to learn and upskill. The website hosts free and premium online courses and tutorials in all technologies, including Java, Python, Spring, REST, Selenium, etc.

javaWebsites.name: w3 Schools
javaWebsites.description: W3Schools is a web developers site, with tutorials and references on web development languages such as Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL, and JQuery

javaWebsites.name: Coursera
javaWebsites.description: Like Udemy, Coursera is an excellent online learning platform that offers quality JavaScript tutorials and courses. Founded by Stanford professors Andrew Ng and Daphne Koller, the platform grew fast and became one of the leading online degree platforms for IT professionals.

javaWebsites.name: Tutorials point
javaWebsites.description: Tutorialspoint.com is a dedicated website to provide quality online education in the domains of Computer Science, Information Technology, Programming Languages, and other Engineering as well as Management subjects.
